name: imdistanda
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w2), wa(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(w2, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w2), wa(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(w2, w3)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(w2, w3)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wi(w2, w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w2), wa(w1, w3)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wi(w2, w3))

comment: Distribution of implication with conjunction (deduction version with conjoined antecedent). (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2011.)
